checkpoints.title: Basics of Supervised Learning
checkpoints.description: Understand the core idea of supervised learning and labeled data.
objectives: Give two real-world examples of supervised learning
checkpoints.success_criteria: Learner can clearly define supervised learning and provide correct examples.

checkpoints.title: Logistic Regression Fundamentals
checkpoints.description: Cover the intuition and basic math of logistic regression.
objectives: Explain why logistic regression is used for classification
Describe the sigmoid function in simple terms
checkpoints.success_criteria: Learner can intuitively explain logistic regression and when to use it.

checkpoints.title: Evaluation Metrics for Classification
checkpoints.description: Understand accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score.
objectives: Define accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score
Explain trade-off between precision and recall
checkpoints.success_criteria: Learner can choose an appropriate metric for a given problem.

checkpoints.title: Overfitting and Regularization
checkpoints.description: Learn why overfitting happens and how regularization helps.
objectives: Explain what overfitting is with an example
Differentiate between L1 and L2 regularization at a high level
checkpoints.success_criteria: Learner can identify overfitting and describe basic mitigation strategies.
